text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to write an etsy review?
text.Response A:
Sure, here are some tips:

1.  Read the item description thoroughly.
2.  Write a clear and concise review.
3.  Include your name and location.
4.  Write a review from your own experience, not from a friend or family member.
5.  Don’t use rude or offensive language.
6.  Don’t be a robot.
7.  Don’t write a review for every single item.
8.  Don’t be afraid to tell the truth.
9.  Don’t be afraid to share your story.
10. Don’t be afraid to say no.
text.Response B: To write an Etsy review, simply go to the item you purchased and scroll down to the ‘Write a Review’ button. You can then rate the item and write a review of your experience. Make sure to be honest and specific in your review to help other buyers make informed decisions.

865.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to write an etsy review?

Response A

Sure, here are some tips:

1. Read the item description thoroughly.
2. Write a clear and concise review.
3. Include your name and location.
4. Write a review from your own experience, not from a friend or family member.
5. Don’t use rude or offensive language.
6. Don’t be a robot.
7. Don’t write a review for every single item.
8. Don’t be afraid to tell the truth.
9. Don’t be afraid to share your story.
10. Don’t be afraid to say no.

Response B

To write an Etsy review, simply go to the item you purchased and scroll down to the ‘Write a Review’ button. You can then rate the item and write a review of your experience. Make sure to be honest and specific in your review to help other buyers make informed decisions.
